# Siemens EtherNet/IP Implementation

## Overview

Siemens produces industrial automation equipment that may support EtherNet/IP, often in conjunction with PROFINET.

## Vendor Information

- **Vendor ID:** Varies (Siemens has multiple vendor IDs)
- **Common Products:** SIMATIC S7, ET 200, I/O modules
- **Documentation:** Siemens EtherNet/IP documentation
